snippet: The American boat Puma won the in-port series to close out the Volvo Ocean Race Saturday, the 39,270 nautical mile marathon that was won by the French entry Groupama.
lead_paragraph: The American boat Puma won the in-port series to close out the Volvo Ocean Race Saturday, the 39,270 nautical mile marathon that was won by the French entry Groupama.

headline.seo: U.S. Boat Puma Wins Volvo Ocean Race Finale
headline.main: American Boat Puma Wins Volvo Ocean Race Finale
